description: Very tasty Spicy Garlic Pork Ramen! Enough kick to make me sweat but not enough to make me wanna stop eating.
Bagels are awesome! Take one with any cream cheese and you can never go wrong. Add some veges on it too and its heaven!

restaurant_address: 5051 Yonge St, North York, ON M2N 5P2
description: The portions were also good and enough for one person. The staff was also friendly and helpful so I would definitely order from this place again.

restaurant_name: 4949 Bathurst St, North York, ON M2R 1Y1
description: Their bagels are freshly made everyday, the texture of the bagel is chewy!
